summary: An unfulfilled divorced woman gets the chance to relive her past when she meets a young man who appears to be her high school sweetheart who died many years before.
cast: Laura Linney|Gabriel Byrne|Lois Smith|Paul Rudd|Topher Grace|Jennifer Carta|Becki Newton|Chris Meyer|Marcia Gay Harden|Ross A. McIntyre|Susan Porro|Stacy Lynn Spierer
title: P.S.
